pullRequest.title: Edit ingest management getting started guide
pullRequest.bodyText:
Summary of changes:

Apply edits to align with Elastics style guidelines for writing about UIs.
Move all prereqs to a single section and added to the list.
Change procedures to use numbered lists for improved scanability.
Movedstandalone steps to appear after fleet steps as requested by @mostlyjason.

nodes.bodyText:
When I wrote this, I had an extra step about installing the integration (can be done from the 'settings' section in the integration details page) and only then explained how to create the data source.
As creating the data source installs the integration in the background I decided describing this step wasn't necessary and I removed the paragraph. Maybe this line should be rephrased or removed so that users don't look for an explicit installation step they don't need. Basically, reading it again, I think it doesn't flow right and could be confusing.
